gov.usgs.locator

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Event

  • public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep all data for one seismic event (earthquake usually).
    Author:
    Ray Buland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Event(java.lang.String earthModel)
      Allocate some storage.

        Allocate some storage.

    • Method Detail

      • getLongitude

        public double getLongitude()

      • getDepth

        public double getDepth()

      • serverIn

        public void serverIn(LocInput in)
        JSON input. If a LocInput object is populated from the JSON input, it will be unpacked here for the relocation.
        Parameters:
        in - Location input information

      • readHydra

        public boolean readHydra(java.lang.String eventID)
        Read a Bulletin Hydra style event input file. File open and read exceptions are trapped.
        Parameters:
        eventID - Hydra style event ID number
        Returns:
        True if the read was successful

      • updateEvent

        public void updateEvent(double originTime,
                        double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        double depth)
        Update event parameters when the hypocenter changes.
        Parameters:
        originTime - Updated origin time in seconds
        latitude - Updated geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Updated longitude in degrees
        depth - Updated depth in kilometers

      • updateHypo

        public void updateHypo(double stepLen,
                       double dT)
        Update event parameters when the hypocenter changes based on a linearized step.
        Parameters:
        stepLen - Step length in kilometers
        dT - Shift in the origin time in seconds

      • updateOrigin

        public void updateOrigin(double dT)
        If we're just updating the origin time, we don't need to recompute distance and azimuth.
        Parameters:
        dT - Shift in the origin time in seconds

      • addAudit

        public void addAudit(int stage,
                     int iter,
                     LocStatus status)
        Add a hypocenter audit record. These double as fall-back hypocenters in case the solution gets worse.
        Parameters:
        stage - Iteration stage
        iter - Iteration in this stage
        status - LocStatus at the point this audit was created

      • saveWres

        public void saveWres()
        Make a shallow copy of wResiduals so that the original order is preserved for the decorrelation projection.

      • resetTriage

        public void resetTriage()
        Reset all the triage flags when triage needs to be repeated.

      • noStations

        public int noStations()
        Get the number of stations.
        Returns:
        Number of stations.

      • staStats

        public void staStats()
        Count the number of stations and picks and find the distance to the closest station.

      • azimuthGap

        public void azimuthGap()
        Compute the azimuthal gap and robust (L-estimator) azimuthal gap in degrees.

      • setQualFlags

        public void setQualFlags(LocStatus status)
        Set the traditional NEIC quality flags. The summary flag uses the algorithm of Buland and Presgrave. The secondary flags break down the quality by epicenter and depth.
        Parameters:
        status - Event status

      • sumErrors

        public void sumErrors()
        Compute the maximum tangential (horizontal) and vertical (depth) projections of the error ellipsoid in kilometers. While not statistically valid, these measures are commonly used by the regional networks.

      • zeroStats

        public void zeroStats(boolean all)
        Zero out most errors when no solution is possible.
        Parameters:
        all - If true zero out everything

      • zeroWeights

        public void zeroWeights()
        Zero out all data importances (and weights) if the importances cannot be computed.

      • setExitCode

        public void setExitCode(LocStatus status)
        Set the location exit status from the more detailed internal status flag.
        Parameters:
        status - Final status from locator

      • serverOut

        public LocOutput serverOut()
        JSON output. Populate a LocOutput object for the JSON output, it will be packed here after the relocation.
        Returns:
        out Location output information

      • stationList

        public void stationList()
        Print a station list.

      • printArrivals

        public void printArrivals(boolean first)
        Print the arrivals associated with this event in a nice format.
        Parameters:
        first - If true only print the first arrival in each pick group

      • printWres

        public void printWres(java.lang.String type,
                      boolean full)
        Print weighted residual storage.
        Parameters:
        type - String identifying the weighted residual storage desired ("Raw" for the sorted picks, "Proj" for the projected picks, and "Org" for the unsorted picks)
        full - If true, print the derivatives as well

      • printAudit

        public void printAudit()
        Print all the audit records.

      • printIn

        public void printIn()
        Print the input event information in a format similar to the Hydra event input file.

      • printHydra

        public void printHydra()
        Print a Bulletin Hydra style output file.

      • printNEIC

        public void printNEIC()
        Print an NEIC style web output.
